overview: She is absolutely sure she wants a divorce! He doesn’t agree, but doesn’t dare contradict. So they go for a divorce. They’d go to the end, if they weren’t stopped by a ridiculous incident...  Why do people part? Where do feeling go in a stream of offences and claims?  The film is a reflection about partings and relationships, where there is no good and bad, but people don’t hear each other, even though they are close.
title: Divorce
